Name: Unbaba
Notes: A large lava enemy that rises up to attack the player. It cannot be defeated by any means and it remains at a fixed position. Usually, it creates a red indicator volume that is rendered when it attacks, although this effect is hard to notice.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rise Height
Obj_arg0.Description: How far up it rises. Default is 500.

Obj_arg1.Name: Reappear Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: The time in frames it takes before it returns to its initial position. Default is 20.

Obj_arg2.Name: Rise Delay
Obj_arg2.Description: The time in frames it takes before it starts to rise up. Default is 30.

Obj_arg3.Name: Hide Indicator Volume?
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, the red indicator volume won't be rendered when it attacks.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will only attack when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
